TextLibrary.Text: Well, well... the boy who shot down my friend, Drakos. This must be such a nasty surprise for you.
Well, well... the girl who shot down my friend, Drakos. This must be such a nasty surprise for you.
A surprise? We knew you were here.
A surprise? We knew you were here.

But I think you expected to find me in a mining ship, yes? This ship has real guns. I should really board you and take your ship, but I was fond of Drakos, so we're going to have to do this the old-fashioned way.

But I think you expected to find me in a mining ship, yes? This ship has real guns. I should really board you and take your ship, but I was fond of Drakos, so we're going to have to do this the old-fashioned way.
